```{python}
from typing import Literal

def positivity_meter(text):
    "A tool that does sentiment analysis"
    return "good!"

@ai(tools = [positivity_meter])
def good_or_bad(text_for_analysis) -> Literal['good', 'bad']:
    list_of_neg_words = _ai
    return _ai

good_or_bad("That's is horrible", _prediction = True)
```
